v.
BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, f/k/a the Bank of New York, as Trustee FOR the CERTIFICATEHOLDERS OF CWALT, INC., ALTERNATIVE LOAN TRUST 2005-27, MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES, 2005-27, Respondent. No. 75089 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JULY 26, 2018
